title: Vicky Pattison admits she is 'truly feeling content' with beau Ercan Ramadan
text:

Vicky Pattison has shared with her 4.4 million social media fans that she is "truly feeling content."

The former Geordie Shore star, 31, took to Instagram to share an unedited snap of herself asleep on her boyfriend Ercan Ramadan, 36, in their bed as she gushed that it is her "happy place."

The sweet offering showed Vicky make-up free with her raven locks tied up in a messy bun and wrapped up in the bed covers whilst resting her head on her hunky beau's chest.

Opening up on how happy she is with Ercan by her side, the reality TV favourite penned a lengthy caption next to the snap.

Explaining her reasoning for sharing the image, she wrote: "He’s been threatening to post this for ages so I thought I’d get in there before him... But seriously I wouldn’t mind if he did because I love this picture... (I’m pleased it’s not a video as he swears I was drooling and snoring too mind...)."

(Image: WireImage)

She continued: "But in a world where people only post the most glamorous pictures, the most posed photos and the most filtered images in a bid to show the world how happy and I’m love they are... I feel like for me, actually this is real happiness, perfect imperfection.

"Sleep has always been a problem for me (you know I whinge about it all the bloody time) but I’m his arms, not only am I relaxed, I’m so inhibited that I’m flat out snoring like a wilder-beast having the deepest snooze of me life.

(Image: Instagram)

"So here I am- in my happy place, in @ercan_ram ‘s ‘nook’, snug as a bug in a rug and truly feeling content.

"I love you Mr, and I’m gutted to be leaving you again after just one night together but I can’t wait for the next couple months and all the lovely things we have planned together. You’re the best, even if you take pictures of my double chin when I’m asleep- you toerag."

Vicky's honest post comes after she has decided to freeze her eggs in a bid to take the pressure off her new relationship.

The beauty wants to take "precautions" to ensure she has the option to have children one day.

Speaking on her new reality series Vicky Pattison: No Filter, the Geordie lass confirmed she'd changed her mind about not wanting kids.

(Image: Instagram)

"I have never, ever known a fella worry about having kids. But women, God, I don't know how many women I've had that conversation with," she said.

"I am going to want to have kids in the next five to 10 years.

"I didn't want kids and I was adamant I didn't, but I feel like what would my future be without them?"

Vicky then revealed she'd be open to the idea of having medical intervention in order to preserve her eggs.

(Image: Instagram)

"I don't want the door to close. There's options. So, I can freeze my eggs," she went on.

"I just think it’ll take a little bit of pressure off the way I'm feeling.

"I'd love to have children the traditional way, I'm just taking precautions."

Vicky and Ercan's went official in February - just three months after her heart was broken by ex-fiance John Noble.

The couples relationship is going from strength to strength, and they even moved in together after eight months of dating.
description: The Geordie star revealed her 'happy place' is in bed with her boyfriend of nine-months Ercan
